title: Reggie Love: "Power Forward"
description: Seven years ago this month, former personal aide to President Barack Obama, Reggie Love, released "Power Forward: My Presidential Education." Michael spoke with the Duke and Wharton graduate, who worked in the White House from 2009-2011, on 2 March 2015. Today, Mr. Love is a senior advisor at Apollo Global Management. The book was published on 2 February 2015.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Michael Smerconish, Reggie Love, TC Scornavacchi)
